lore: Eventually, Zonte and his teacher Ainsworth realized that something was wrong in the Refuge of the Magi. Many of their friends were behaving strangely and had become sullen and hostile. Others had disappeared with several Djinns, never to return. Zonte and Ainsworth finally decided to give life in secret to the Unchained, a loyal Djinn. It told the others a story of suffering at the hands of the Magi so they would leave the Refuge of the Magi, but its words had an unexpected result, and the insurrection began at that very moment.
menagerieDialog: Make a wish. The only rule is that you can't wish for more wishes.
The most powerful weapon is deceit. You'd do well to remember that.
I don't trust Everett. I think it's because his haircut is terrible.
Make a wish, then blow out the fire on my head.
Your creatures would be nothing without my support. You're welcome.
name: Unchained Djinn
